title: Lolwiz
body:
So I was thinking of getting Lolwiz, just checking to see whether or not you get banned for using this software?

Thanks.

replies.body:
**Riot Sargonas** [confirmed 2 years ago](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI/d/ao7rYcrT?comment=0012) that LoLWiz was safe to use, and the program hasn't really changed since then. 

But let me be very clear, **use this program at your own risk**. If something goes wrong with your game or client, Riot isn't responsible.

Also, Riot reserves the right to change their stance on this program, so it's YOUR responsibility to make sure you stay updated about this. If Riot changes their stance on LoLWiz and starts to issue punishments to people who use it, _"I didn't know"_ will not be good enough.
Thanks, probably won't be worth the risk.
